column6:
"Hey Cyclops!" ,2008,3
"Huh?"
"Why're ya so dang boring?"
"I dunno."
"Well...if we give ya a whole issue of First Class, do you
promise to be cool?"
"Ok."
"Deal!"
32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
